sentences.en: Be careful not to misstate your case.
sentences.cn: 小心别把你的情况讲错了.

sentences.en: Look at the false police reports that omitted or misstated crucial facts.
sentences.cn: 看看那些失实的警方报告吧，它们忽略或谎报了关键的事实。

sentences.en: The amount was misstated in the table because of an error by regulators.
sentences.cn: 由于校准者的失误，图表里的数目是错误的。

trans.tran_en: If you misstate something, you state it incorrectly or give false information about it
